name: Inside Out: The Fan Game
description:
Take control as the protagonist of the Inside Out franchise, Joy, and travel through time! Collect treasure, fight powerful bosses and discover numerous secrets! The game features action-packed levels, playful cutscenes, and unlockable flashback levels!

Inside Out: The Fan Game was originally released in early 2016. Now, it has been created in Construct 2 to be even better! Experience the game again with some new visuals, fixes and other additions as well as in honor of Elemental, Elio, and Inside Out 2!

This game is inspired by ARD Mode of Crash Bandicoot as well as the Rayman Redemption and DuckTales 1 and 2 in NES. Also this element includes similarities with Mega Man, Castlevania, and Crash Bandicoot.

Special thanks for Prabowo Muhammad for remixing Crash (and other game) songs for the game, and Sky Pirate Studios and Prabowo Muhammad for drawing Joy from Inside Out in pixel art! Find them both via these links:

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCAhhXr2ZRQUrQGczke_5vKg

#platformer

This game is a non-profit fan project. All properties used belong to their respective owners. No copyright infringement intended.
